import React, { useState } from "react"; import NavBar2 from "./NavBar2.js"; const LearnChess = () => { const [isBeginner, setIsBeginner] = useState(true); const toggleLevel = () => { setIsBeginner(!isBeginner); }; return (

Learn Chess

{isBeginner ? (

Beginner

Chess Board

Learn about the chessboard layout and how pieces are positioned.

Rules of Each Piece

Detailed explanations of movement and capturing rules for each chess piece.

Castling

Explanation of the castling move and when it can be performed.

En Passant

Understanding the en passant rule for capturing pawns.

Introductory Opening Moves

Common opening moves and their purposes in chess.

) : (

Intermediate

Chess Tactics

Introduction to chess tactics and strategies for intermediate players.

{/* Add more content for intermediate level */}

Advanced Openings

Detailed analysis of advanced opening variations in chess.

{/* Add more content for intermediate level */}
{/* Add more chapters for intermediate level */}
)}
); }; export default LearnChess;
